reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute and flattering, with one mentioning it's perfect for curvier bodies and another noting it hides the tummy well. Moreover, the dress receives positive feedback for its quality, comfort, and lightweight design. However, the fabric quality receives mixed reviews, with some praising it while others find it cheap. Additionally, customers disagree on the length, with some finding it perfect fo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress! Highly recommend!
items.body: I ordered this dress for my bridal shower & was very pleased with it. It flows beautifully & was very flattering for my body shape. I am 5”5 around 170 lbs with a more curvy body type & size medium was perfect for me. The only thing I will note is that it’s a little more fitted in the breast area (I’m a B cup & medium was perfect so I will say if you have bigger breasts you may want to order up one size just to allow a little more room in that area). Also, like any packaged clothing you order online it arrived a little wrinkled but I had it steamed & it was perfect. Definitely worth the money & a fabulous dress for any occasion. Read more
items.author: Kamryn Avila

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Buy It, Stay true to your size!
items.body: Beautiful White Dress. I weight 200 lbs and my height is 5' 3'. Bust size 42 DD. Yes it has wrinkles from being inside a package in the pictures. But as soon as I washed and dried it there were no wrinkles. Overall fits good for a plus size women. I wear usually 16,18-20 in sizes and 2XL. This 2XL fits perfect. It is a beautiful dress for a plus siE girlie. Read more
items.author: Amanda Howard

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty fit dress
items.body: Snug fit and fabric is really soft. The string on back is pretty for adjusting the top of the dress, skirt is loose so you can move comfortable, and the waist is also loose it doesn’t hug you like most dresses. Love the color it’s not too light and fabric is thick so it’s not see through. Dress is long but I’m 4’11 so it was expected. Read more
items.author: Eun Hyun joong

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars One side shorter than the other- returned
items.body: Well the top and back was so cute but they obviously hemmed it so wrong! One side is completely different than the other. The shorter side was right below my butt and the other was almost to my knee. I was so sad because this dress would have been so cute and fit perfect if it was all one length. Read more
items.author: Cristina Rivera

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Weird fit
items.body: It fit a bit weird around my waist. It was a little long for my liking as well. It was big on my waist but fit my bust. Definitely cute tho! Just not for my body Read more
items.author: Kaileigh Decker

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Material is different!
items.body: Runs a little small Cloth is like SHEIN material Very flattering Love the dress overall Not see through Has lining under the dress to ensure comfort and privacy Pure white color Read more
items.author: Anonymous

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, Feminine, and Super Comfortable!
items.body: The fabric feels lightweight and breathable, and it doesn’t wrinkle easily, which is great for travel. I wore it to brunch and got several compliments! It’s cute enough for a date or casual outing but can also be dressed up with heels and jewelry. Definitely a great value for the price. Read more
items.author: Mx Hernandez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and fit
items.body: Loved this dress as soon as I pulled it out of the package. Great quality and fits great. Is super comfortable. This was about my 10th dress I have tried on for an upcoming event and finally found the one! I am 5’2 and it’s hard to find the perfect length but I did! Read more
items.author: Tabatha Findley

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Mint Green, Red, White, Blue, Yellow, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
